docs.snippet: Josh Harris, the principal owner of the Philadelphia 76ers, is expected to buy the Devils and assume their lease in Newark in a deal said to be worth more than $320 million....
docs.lead_paragraph: Josh Harris, the principal owner of the Philadelphia 76ers, is expected to buy the Devils and assume their lease in Newark in a deal said to be worth more than $320 million.
docs.abstract: Philadelphia 76ers principal owner Josh Harris is expected to buy NHL's New Jersey Devils and assume their lease at the Prudential Center in Newark in a deal said to be worth more than $320 million.

byline.original: By KEN BELSON and JEFF Z. KLEIN

docs.snippet: GARFINKEL--Jack, 95, August 14, 2013. Predeceased by his beloved wife Lillian of 55 years. Devoted father of Barbara (Vernon) and Richard. Loving brother to Sidney. His joy of living and loving ways will be missed by all. Retired professional bask...
docs.lead_paragraph: GARFINKEL--Jack, 95, August 14, 2013. Predeceased by his beloved wife Lillian of 55 years. Devoted father of Barbara (Vernon) and Richard. Loving brother to Sidney. His joy of living and loving ways will be missed by all. Retired professional basketball player and teacher. Visiting 5-8pm Thursday. Services 11:30am Friday at IJ Morris, Brooklyn.

docs.snippet: The latest convergence of private equity and professional sports is over the New Jersey Devils, as Joshua Harris, of Apollo Global Management, and David S. Blitzer, of the Blackstone Group, agreed to buy the team....
docs.abstract: The latest convergence of private equity and professional sports is over the New Jersey Devils, as Joshua Harris, of Apollo Global Management, and David S. Blitzer, of the Blackstone Group, agreed to buy the team.

headline.main: Apollo's Harris and Blackstone's Blitzer Strike Deal for Devils

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

docs.snippet: A pair of private equity executives who own a majority of the Philadelphia 76ers basketball team on Thursday reached a deal to acquire the New Jersey Devils hockey team and its arena....
docs.lead_paragraph: A pair of private equity executives who own a majority of the Philadelphia 76ers basketball team on Thursday reached a deal to acquire the New Jersey Devils hockey team and its arena.

headline.main: NHL's Devils Sold to Owners of Philadelphia 76ers
headline.print_headline: NHL's Devils Sold to Owners of Philadelphia 76ers
